I would like a default timeout as well for other reasons.  I have a
CruiseC=
ontrol machine doing continuous integration, and occasionally
someone write=
s a unit test that hangs, which also hangs the entire
CruiseControl process=
.  Because the test process never completes, I
can't tell which test hung.
=

If I could set a default timeout, something generous like 5 minutes,
then =
hanging tests would eventually fail and everything would wrap up
cleanly.  =
Perhaps a system property would fit the bill.
